column5: Being a former top canadian track and field athlete I hate to see Canadian Athletes treated unfairly.  This goes on way to much.  My girlfriend owns a Gymnastics club so I know what it takes to be a gymnast and to be the number 1 all around gymnast in Canada and not be selected to the Olympic team is crazy and makes me very sick to my stomach.   Please help this young Athlete out guys.  Thanks!  http://www.petitiononline.com/canwag/petition.html
Gotta say it: That petition could get a 1,000 or 100, 000 signatures and it would make no difference.  electronic petitions are heavily discounted when it comes to large organizations.  forrest
ya I realize that but never hurts for them to at least try it.  Just thought I would try and help this young athlete out when I saw the petition
it is better then nothing forrest, and it gives people a chance (illusion) that their voice is being heard.....   again... better then nothing...  G
What is the reason that she was left off of the Olympic team?  I apologize if it was stated on link but I didn't see it.  It is something that I would want to know before signing the petition.
